channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WordPress Backup & Migration
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WordPress Backup & Migration

item.title: CVE-2023-5737|2024-08-02T08:07:32.645Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20backup%20%26%20migration
item.description: The WordPress Backup & Migration WordPress plugin before 1.4.4 does not authorize some AJAX requests, allowing users with a role as low as Subscriber to update some plugin settings.

item.title: CVE-2023-5738|2024-08-02T08:07:32.600Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20backup%20%26%20migration
item.description: The WordPress Backup & Migration WordPress plugin before 1.4.4 does not sanitise and escape some parameters, which could allow users with a role as low as Subscriber to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
